00020 CAVSystem::CAVSystem():
00021     m_bType(btBox),
00022         m_vCol(0.2f, 0.4f, 0.9f),
00023         m_vColMarked(0.2f, 0.9f, 0.2f),
00024         m_vColHighlighted(0.3f, 0.4f, 0.9f),
00025         m_iTex(0),
00026         m_bTextured(false),
00027         m_bDrawing(false),
00028         m_bHoriz(true),
00029         m_bFrame(true),

00031         m_vMaxSize(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f),
00032         m_vSizeAsp(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f)
00033     {
00034         g_Log.AddMsg(lmNormal, "%s initialisation", typeid(*this).name());

00043                                                                         const VECTOR3D &vColHighlighted) {

00054 
00055 void CAVSystem::DrawDiagramBlock(double fValue, ColorType cType) {
00056         if (m_bDrawing == false) return;
00057 
00058         switch (cType) {
00059                 case ctNormal:      glColor3fv(m_vCol.m); break;
00060                 case ctHighlighted: glColor3fv(m_vColHighlighted.m); break;
00061                 case ctMarked:      glColor3fv(m_vColMarked.m); break;
00062         }
00063 
00064         switch ( m_bType ) {
00065                 case btPoint: {
00066                         glPushMatrix();
00067                             glTranslatef(0.0f, m_vSizeAsp.y*(float)fValue, 0.0f);
00068                                 DrawSphere(m_vSizeAsp.x*0.75f, m_vSizeAsp.x*0.75f, m_vSizeAsp.x*0.75f, m_iLod/2, m_iLod/3);
00069                         glPopMatrix();
00070                         break;
00071                         }
00072                 case btBox: {
00073                         glPushMatrix();
00074                                 glTranslatef(0.0f, m_vSizeAsp.y*(float)fValue*0.5f, 0.0f);
00075                                 DrawBox(m_vSizeAsp.x, m_vSizeAsp.y*(float)fValue, m_vSizeAsp.x);
00076                         glPopMatrix();
00077                         break;
00078                         }
00079                 case btPyramid: {
00080                         DrawPyramid(m_vSizeAsp.x, m_vSizeAsp.y*(float)fValue);
00081                         break;
00082                         }
00083                 case btCylinder: {
00084                         glPushMatrix();
00085                                 glTranslatef(0.0f, m_vSizeAsp.y*(float)fValue*0.5f, 0.0f);
00086                                 DrawCylinder(m_vSizeAsp.x*0.5f, m_vSizeAsp.y*(float)fValue, m_iLod, 1, false);
00087                         glPopMatrix();
00088                         break;
00089                         }
00090         }
00091 
00092         glTranslatef(m_vSizeAsp.x, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00093 }
00094 
00095 void CAVSystem::EndDrawing() {
00096         if (m_bDrawing == true) {
00097                 glPopMatrix();
00098                 m_bDrawing = false;
00099         }
00100 }
